caption:
“The trumpet of truth never grows silent.”

Reflection:
Through centuries, the sound still calls the soul to awaken. Truth echoes beyond time’s reach.

Commentary:
This reflection reminds us that truth is eternal — it resounds through prophets, poets, and everyday hearts that dare to speak.
